description: Classic Modern Fit Dress Shirt, 2 Extra Collars Stays Included. This shirt is made from the finest thread-count cotton, requires six hours of labor and more than 100 sewing operations. The majority of our men's dress shirts are fully made of 100% Cotton Fabric. Through strict quality control standards and a careful selection process, we ensure high quality men's dress shirts. This dress shirt can be worn for both casual and formal events. This shirt has a classic modern fit. Machine Wash or Dry Clean. Imported China
